tool_description: Access some data from the Steam Store backend, including featured lists, detailed game info and livestreams
title: Steam Store Data

api_list.name: Featured Games
api_list.description: Returns lists of featured games on Windows and macOS
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-store-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/featured/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-store-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Livestream Info
api_list.description: Returns a list of current popular Steam game livestreams
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-store-data.p.rapidapi.com/broadcast/ajaxgetpopularpartnerbroadcasts/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-store-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getPlayerAchievementsVersion1

optional_parameters.name: l
optional_parameters.description: Optional. If possible, returns data in the specified language. Use ISO 639 code to specify the language

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Steam Community API key

optional_parameters.name: steamid
optional_parameters.description: 64-bit SteamID of the user you want achievements for

optional_parameters.name: appid
optional_parameters.description: AppID of the game you want achievements for

api_list.name: Featured Categories
api_list.description:
Returns lists of games separated by categories: Specials, Coming Soon, Top Sellers, New Releases

It is not known what effect the two optional parameters have

optional_parameters.name: extra
optional_parameters.description: Unknown effect (not documented)

optional_parameters.name: trailer
optional_parameters.description: Unknown effect (not documented)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-store-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/featuredcategories/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-store-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Package Details
api_list.description:
Returns data on Steam Packages (generally game bundles etc.)
packageids - Comma-separated list of Package IDs you want data for

required_parameters.name: packageids
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Package IDs you want data for

api_list.name: App Details
api_list.description:
Returns data for given AppID(s). This data is equivalent to what you would see on the games official Steam store page.

appids - Comma-separated list of AppIDs you want data for
filters - Filter the keys that get returned. If you list multiple AppIDs for "appids", this MUST be set to "price_overview". "basic" will return a smaller subset of keys

required_parameters.name: appids
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of AppIDs you want data for

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description: Filter the keys that get returned. If you list multiple AppIDs for \\\\\\\"appids\\\\\\\", this MUST be set to \\\\\\\"price_overview\\\\\\\". \\\\\\\"basic\\\\\\\" will return a smaller subset of keys

api_list.name: getPlayerSummariesVersion2

optional_parameters.name: steamids
optional_parameters.description: List of the 64-bit SteamIDs you want profile information for. Separate using commas

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Steam Community API key

api_list.name: getNewsForAppVersion2

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the data: JSON (default), XML, VDF

optional_parameters.name: appid
optional_parameters.description: The AppID of the game you want news for

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of news articles to return

optional_parameters.name: maxlength
optional_parameters.description: The maximum length of each news article

api_list.name: getGlobalAchievementPercentagesForAppVersion2

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the data: JSON (default), XML, VDF

optional_parameters.name: gameid
optional_parameters.description: The AppID of the game you want data for

api_list.name: getOwnedGamesVersion1

optional_parameters.name: appids_filter
optional_parameters.description: Filter output to a list of AppIDs. Must be defined in a JSON list (e.g.  "appids_filter: [ 440, 500, 550 ]", including quotes)

optional_parameters.name: include_played_free_games
optional_parameters.description: Set true if you want free games the player has played to be included. These games are owned by all users and exluded by default.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Steam Community API key

optional_parameters.name: include_appinfo
optional_parameters.description: Set true to return game name and icon. Returns only AppID by default

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the data: JSON (default), XML, VDF

optional_parameters.name: steamid
optional_parameters.description: 64-bit SteamID of the user you want to get the games of

api_list.name: getRecentlyPlayedGamesVersion1

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Steam Community API key

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the data: JSON (default), XML, VDF

optional_parameters.name: steamid
optional_parameters.description: 64-bit SteamID of the account you want games for

api_list.name: getUserStatsForGameVersion2

optional_parameters.name: steamid
optional_parameters.description: 64-bit SteamID of the user you want achievements for

optional_parameters.name: appid
optional_parameters.description: AppID of the game you want achievements for

optional_parameters.name: l
optional_parameters.description: Optional. If possible, returns data in the specified language. Use ISO 639 code to specify the language

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Steam Community API key

api_list.name: getFriendListVersion1

optional_parameters.name: steamid
optional_parameters.description: 64-bit SteamID of a friend

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: Steam Community API key

optional_parameters.name: relationship
optional_parameters.description: Relationship filter. Possible values: friend, all

optional_parameters.name: l
optional_parameters.description: Optional. If possible, returns data in the specified language. Use ISO 639 code to specify the language
